description: Document model for managing accounts with KYC/AML status tracking
name: Accounts

operations.name: ADD_ACCOUNT
operations.schema:
input AddAccountInput {
  id: OID!
  account: String!
  name: String!
  budgetPath: String
  accountTransactionsId: PHID
  chain: [String!]
  type: AccountTypeInput
  owners: [String!]
  KycAmlStatus: KycAmlStatusTypeInput
}

enum AccountTypeInput {
  Protocol
  Auditor
  Operational
  PaymentProcessor
}

enum KycAmlStatusTypeInput {
  PASSED
  PENDING
  FAILED
}

operations.name: UPDATE_ACCOUNT
operations.schema:
input UpdateAccountInput {
    id: OID!
    account: String
    name: String
    budgetPath: String
    accountTransactionsId: PHID
    chain: [String!]
    type: AccountTypeInput
    owners: [String!]
    KycAmlStatus: KycAmlStatusTypeInput
}

operations.name: UPDATE_KYC_STATUS
